trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Bremerton
There were no other sightings in Bremerton on or around October 24th 2010
Summary: Bright flash of light ,Triangle craft appeared ,headed from north to south
divs: Sighting DetailsAt home on front porch looking at night sky through 3rd generation night vision goggles . I was looking west of my location when noticed a bright flicker of light to the north . Then another bright flick of light . Craft just appeared from the flash of light . From a dead stop it started off south an a steady clip an continued south untill I could no longer see it . Triangle shaped craft with round light on each corner . Black . Lights seemed like they were on low . No noise . Caught off guard by what I witnessed . Usually see birds,bats,planes,satellites or points of light moving fast that can not be identified.
